trans-unit.source: A menu consists of a list of action items. Actions are added with the addAction(), addActions() and insertAction() functions. An action is represented vertically and rendered by QStyle. In addition, actions can have a text label, an optional icon drawn on the very left side, and shortcut key sequence such as "Ctrl+X".

trans-unit.target: 菜单项，它是QMenu :: defaultAction（）指定的默认操作。

trans-unit.source: A menu item, like QMenuItem.
trans-unit.target: 一个菜单项,如QMenuItem。

trans-unit.target: 一个菜单分离器。

trans-unit.source: A menu which lists options that the user can select to perform an action.
trans-unit.target: 一个菜单,它列出了用户可以选择的选项,以执行一个动作。

trans-unit.source: A menu widget is a selection menu. It can be either a pull-down menu in a menu bar or a standalone context menu. Pull-down menus are shown by the menu bar when the user clicks on the respective item or presses the specified shortcut key. Use QMenuBar::addMenu() to insert a menu into a menu bar. Context menus are usually invoked by some special keyboard key or by right-clicking. They can be executed either asynchronously with popup() or synchronously with exec(). Menus can also be invoked in response to button presses; these are just like context menus except for how they are invoked.
trans-unit.target: 菜单小部件是选择菜单。它可以是菜单栏中的下拉菜单，也可以是独立的上下文菜单。当用户单击相应项目或按下指定的快捷键时，菜单栏会显示下拉菜单。使用QMenuBar :: addMenu（）将菜单插入菜单栏。上下文菜单通常通过某些特殊的键盘键或右键单击来调用。它们可以与popup（）异步执行，也可以与exec（）同步执行。也可以响应按钮的按下来调用菜单。这些与上下文菜单一样，只是它们的调用方式不同。

trans-unit.source: A menu, like QMenu.
trans-unit.target: 菜单，例如QMenu。

trans-unit.source: A menubar consists of a list of drop-down menus.
trans-unit.target: 一个menubar由一个下拉菜单列表组成。

trans-unit.source: A message box displays a primary text to alert the user to a situation, an informative text to further explain the alert or to ask the user a question, and an optional detailed text to provide even more data if the user requests it. A message box can also display an icon and standard buttons for accepting a user response.
trans-unit.target: 消息框显示用于向用户发出警报的主要文本，用于进一步说明警报或询问用户问题的信息性文本，以及用于在用户请求时提供更多数据的可选详细文本。消息框还可以显示一个图标和用于接受用户响应的标准按钮。

trans-unit.source: A message dialog is used to inform the user, or ask the user a question. A message dialog displays a primary text to alert the user to a situation, an informative text to further explain the alert or to ask the user a question, and an optional detailed text to provide even more data if the user requests it. A message box can also display a configurable set of buttons for accepting a user response.
trans-unit.target: 消息对话框用于通知用户或向用户提问。消息对话框显示主要文本，以警告用户注意某种情况；提供信息的文本，以进一步说明警报或询问用户问题；以及可选的详细文本，以在用户请求时提供更多数据。消息框还可以显示一组可配置的按钮，用于接受用户响应。

trans-unit.source: A message generated by the qCritical() function.
trans-unit.target: 由qCritical（）函数生成的消息。

trans-unit.source: A message generated by the qDebug() function.
trans-unit.target: 由qDebug（）函数生成的消息。

trans-unit.source: A message generated by the qFatal() function.
trans-unit.target: 由qFatal（）函数生成的消息。

trans-unit.source: A message generated by the qInfo() function.
trans-unit.target: 由qInfo（）函数生成的消息。

trans-unit.source: A message generated by the qWarning() function.
trans-unit.target: 由qWarning（）函数生成的消息。

trans-unit.source: A meta-object contains information about a class that inherits QObject, e.g. class name, superclass name, properties, signals and slots. Every QObject subclass that contains the Q_OBJECT macro will have a meta-object.
trans-unit.target: 元对象包含有关继承QObject的类的信息，例如，类名称，超类名称，属性，信号和插槽。每个包含Q_OBJECT宏的QObject子类都将具有一个元对象。

trans-unit.source: A method of an object type is a function which may be called to perform some processing or trigger further events. A method can be connected to a signal so that it is automatically invoked whenever the signal is emitted. See Signal and Handler Event System for more details.

A method of an object type is a function which may be called to perform some processing or trigger further events. A method can be connected to a signal so that it is automatically invoked whenever the signal is emitted. See Signal and Handler Event System for more details.
trans-unit.target: 对象类型的方法是一种可以调用以执行某些处理或触发其他事件的功能。可以将一种方法连接到信号，以便每当发出信号时都会自动调用该方法。有关更多详细信息，请参见信号和处理程序事件系统。

trans-unit.source: A modal widget is a special top-level widget which is a subclass of QDialog that specifies the modal parameter of the constructor as true. A modal widget must be closed before the user can continue with other parts of the program.
trans-unit.target: 模态窗口小部件是特殊的顶级窗口小部件，它是QDialog的子类，它指定构造函数的模态参数为true。用户必须先关闭模式小部件，然后用户才能继续执行程序的其他部分。

trans-unit.source: A modal window is a window which has its modality property set to Qt::WindowModal or Qt::ApplicationModal. A modal window must be closed before the user can continue with other parts of the program.
trans-unit.target: 模态窗口是其模态属性设置为Qt :: WindowModal或Qt :: ApplicationModal的窗口。用户必须先关闭模式窗口，然后才能继续执行程序的其他部分。

trans-unit.source: A modal window prevents other windows from getting any input.
trans-unit.target: 模态窗口可以防止其他窗口获得任何输入。

trans-unit.source: A modal window prevents other windows from receiving input events. Possible values are Qt.NonModal (the default), Qt.WindowModal, and Qt.ApplicationModal.
trans-unit.target: 模态窗口阻止其他窗口接收输入事件。可能的值是Qt.NonModal(默认)、Qt.WindowModal和Qt.ApplicationModal。

trans-unit.source: A modal window prevents other windows from receiving input events. Qt supports two types of modality: Qt::WindowModal and Qt::ApplicationModal.
trans-unit.target: 模态窗口可防止其他窗口接收输入事件。Qt支持两种类型的模态：Qt :: WindowModal和Qt :: ApplicationModal。

A model can be defined by subclassing QAbstractItemModel. This is the best approach if you have a more complex model that cannot be supported by the other approaches. A QAbstractItemModel can also automatically notify a QML view when the model data changes.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过子类QAbstractItemModel定义模型。如果您拥有其他方法无法支持的更复杂的模型，则这是最佳方法。甲化QAbstractItemModel还可以自动通知QML视图当模型数据改变。

trans-unit.source: A model can consist of several sub-meshes, each of which can have its own material. The sub-mess uses a material from the materials list, corresponding to its index. If the number of materials is less than the sub-meshes, the last material in the list is used for subsequent sub-meshes.
A model holds data items and maintains their structure. The model is also responsible for retrieving the items from a data source.
trans-unit.target: 模型持有数据项并维护其结构。该模型还负责从数据源中检索数据项。

trans-unit.source: A modeless dialog is a dialog that operates independently of other content around the dialog. When a modeless dialog is opened, the user is allowed to interact with both the dialog and the other content in the same window.
trans-unit.target: 无模型对话框是一个独立于对话框周围其他内容运行的对话框,当打开一个无模型对话框时,用户可以在同一窗口中与对话框和其他内容进行交互。当一个无模型对话框被打开时,用户可以在同一个窗口中同时与该对话框和其他内容进行交互。

trans-unit.source: A modeless dialog:
trans-unit.target: 无模型对话框。

trans-unit.source: A modeless progress dialog is suitable for operations that take place in the background, where the user is able to interact with the application. Such operations are typically based on QTimer (or QObject::timerEvent()) or QSocketNotifier; or performed in a separate thread. A QProgressBar in the status bar of your main window is often an alternative to a modeless progress dialog.
trans-unit.target: 无模式进度对话框适用于在后台进行的操作，用户可以在其中与应用程序进行交互。这样的操作通常基于QTimer（或QObject :: timerEvent（））或QSocketNotifier；或在单独的线程中执行。一个QProgressBar在主窗口的状态栏通常是无模式进度对话框的替代品。

trans-unit.source: A modified window is a window whose content has changed but has not been saved to disk. This flag will have different effects varied by the platform. On macOS the close button will have a modified look; on other platforms, the window title will have an '*' (asterisk).
trans-unit.target: 修改后的窗口是内容已更改但尚未保存到磁盘的窗口。该标志将因平台而异。在macOS上，关闭按钮的外观会有所修改；在其他平台上，窗口标题将带有“ *”（星号）。

trans-unit.source: A modified window is a window whose content has changed but has not been saved to disk. This flag will have different effects varied by the platform. On macOS the close button will have a modified look; on other platforms, the window title will have an '*' (asterisk).

A monoblock device sitting at rest, face up on a desk will experience a force of approximately 9.8 on the Z axis (ie. towards the roof). This is the proper acceleration the device experiences relative to freefall.

The buttons are specified by combining values using the bitwise OR operator. The display order for the buttons is platform dependent.

trans-unit.source: A more naive comparison algorithm might incorrectly return true on all versions of macOS, including Mac OS 9. This behavior is achieved by overloading the comparison operators to return false whenever the OS types of the QOperatingSystemVersion instances being compared do not match. Be aware that due to this it can be the case x >= y and x < y are BOTH false for the same instances of x and y.
trans-unit.target: 较幼稚的比较算法可能会在包括Mac OS 9在内的所有macOS版本上错误地返回true ，这是通过在比较的QOperatingSystemVersion实例的操作系统类型不匹配时使比较运算符重载来返回 false 来实现的。请注意，由于这一点，可以是这种情况 x > = y和 x <Y均为 false 对于相同实例 x 和 y 。

trans-unit.source: A more naive comparison algorithm might incorrectly return true on all versions of macOS, including Mac OS 9. This behavior is achieved by overloading the comparison operators to return false whenever the OS types of the QOperatingSystemVersion instances being compared do not match. Be aware that due to this it can be the case x >= y and x < y are BOTH false for the same instances of x and y.

trans-unit.source: A mouse event contains a special accept flag that indicates whether the receiver wants the event. You should call ignore() if the mouse event is not handled by your widget. A mouse event is propagated up the parent widget chain until a widget accepts it with accept(), or an event filter consumes it.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标事件包含一个特殊的接受标志，该标志指示接收者是否想要该事件。如果小部件未处理鼠标事件，则应调用ignore（）。鼠标事件将在父窗口小部件链上传播，直到窗口小部件使用accept（）接受它，或者事件过滤器将其消耗掉为止。

trans-unit.source: A mouse plugin can be created by subclassing QGenericPlugin and reimplementing the pure virtual create() function. By exporting the derived class using the Q_PLUGIN_METADATA() macro, The default implementation of the QGenericPluginFactory class will automatically detect the plugin and load the driver into the server application at run-time. See How to Create Qt Plugins for details.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过子类化QGenericPlugin并重新实现纯虚拟create（）函数来创建鼠标插件。通过使用Q_PLUGIN_METADATA（）宏导出派生类，QGenericPluginFactory类的默认实现将自动检测插件，并在运行时将驱动程序加载到服务器应用程序中。有关详细信息，请参见如何创建Qt插件。

trans-unit.source: A mouse plugin can be created by subclassing QGenericPlugin and reimplementing the pure virtual create() function. See How to Create Qt Plugins for details.

trans-unit.source: A non-computing example of a semaphore would be dining at a restaurant. A semaphore is initialized with the number of chairs in the restaurant. As people arrive, they want a seat. As seats are filled, available() is decremented. As people leave, the available() is incremented, allowing more people to enter. If a party of 10 people want to be seated, but there are only 9 seats, those 10 people will wait, but a party of 4 people would be seated (taking the available seats to 5, making the party of 10 people wait longer).
trans-unit.target: 信号量的非计算示例是在餐厅用餐。使用餐厅中的椅子数量初始化信号量。当人们到达时，他们想要一个座位。填充座位后，可用（）会减少。当人们离开时，可用（）会增加，从而允许更多人进入。如果要坐10人的宴会，但只有9个席位，则这10人将等待，但要坐4人的宴会（将可用座位增加到5，使10人的宴会等待更长的时间） 。

trans-unit.source: A non-existing variable referenced.
trans-unit.target: 引用了一个不存在的变量。

trans-unit.source: A non-interactive button does not react to user interaction, but is still visually enabled. A typical use case for non- interactive buttons are notification icons.

trans-unit.source: A non-interactive scroll bar is visually and behaviorally similar to ScrollIndicator. This property is useful for switching between typical mouse- and touch-orientated UIs with interactive and non-interactive scroll bars, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 非交互式滚动条在外观和行为上与ScrollIndicator相似。此属性对于分别在具有交互式和非交互式滚动条的典型鼠标和触摸式UI之间进行切换很有用。

trans-unit.target: 非null的QMediaContent将始终具有对通过canonicalUrl（）或canonicalRequest（）方法可用的内容的引用。

trans-unit.source: A non-null QMediaContent will always have a reference to the content available through the request() method.

A non-persistent QGeoAreaMonitorInfo will be removed by the system once the application owning the monitor object stops. Persistent objects remain active and can be retrieved once the application restarts.

trans-unit.target: 非单词边界。只要\ b为假，该断言就为真。例如，如果我们在“ Left on”中搜索\ Bon \ B，则匹配将失败（字符串的空格和结尾不是非单词边界），但将在“ t on ne”中匹配。

trans-unit.source: A note about arguments: Our experience shows that signals and slots are more reusable if they do not use special types. If QScrollBar::valueChanged() were to use a special type such as the hypothetical QScrollBar::Range, it could only be connected to slots designed specifically for QScrollBar. Connecting different input widgets together would be impossible.
trans-unit.target: 关于参数的注释：我们的经验表明，如果信号和插槽不使用特殊类型，则它们将更可重用。如果QScrollBar :: valueChanged（）使用特殊的类型，例如假设的QScrollBar :: Range，则只能将其连接到专门为QScrollBar设计的插槽。将不同的输入小部件连接在一起是不可能的。

trans-unit.source: A note on logical vs physical dots per inch: physical DPI is based on the actual physical pixel sizes when available, and is useful for print preview and other cases where it's desirable to know the exact physical dimensions of screen displayed contents.
trans-unit.target: 关于逻辑与物理每英寸点数的说明:物理DPI是基于实际的物理像素尺寸(如果有的话),对于打印预览和其他需要了解屏幕显示内容的确切物理尺寸的情况是有用的。

trans-unit.target: 直接从提交页面输入的页面的“ 后退”按钮被禁用。

trans-unit.source: A page has the following attributes, which are rendered by QWizard: a title, a subTitle, and a set of pixmaps. See Elements of a Wizard Page for details. Once a page is added to the wizard (using QWizard::addPage() or QWizard::setPage()), wizard() returns a pointer to the associated QWizard object.
trans-unit.target: 页面具有以下属性，这些属性由QWizard呈现：标题，子标题和一组pixmaps。有关详细信息，请参见向导页面的元素。将页面添加到向导后（使用QWizard :: addPage（）或QWizard :: setPage（）），向导（）将返回指向关联的QWizard对象的指针。

A page tab that the user can select to switch to a different page in a dialog.

trans-unit.source: A pager.
trans-unit.target: 一个传呼机。

trans-unit.source: A paint context is used when rendering custom layouts for QTextDocuments with the QAbstractTextDocumentLayout::draw() function. It is specified by a cursor position, default text color, clip rectangle and a collection of selections.
trans-unit.target: 当使用QAbstractTextDocumentLayout :: draw（）函数为QTextDocuments渲染自定义布局时，使用绘制上下文。它由光标位置，默认文本颜色，剪辑矩形和选择集指定。

trans-unit.source: A paint device is an abstraction of a two-dimensional space that can be drawn on using a QPainter. Its default coordinate system has its origin located at the top-left position. X increases to the right and Y increases downwards. The unit is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: 绘制设备是可以使用QPainter绘制的二维空间的抽象。其默认坐标系的原点位于左上角。X向右增加，Y向下方增加。单位是一个像素。

trans-unit.source: A paint engine must update every dirty state.
trans-unit.target: 油漆引擎必须每脏状态更新一次。

trans-unit.source: A paint event is a request to repaint all or part of a widget. It can happen for one of the following reasons:
trans-unit.target: 绘制事件是重新绘制全部或部分小组件的请求。它可能因以下原因之一而发生。

trans-unit.source: A painter path is an object composed of a number of graphical building blocks, such as rectangles, ellipses, lines, and curves. Building blocks can be joined in closed subpaths, for example as a rectangle or an ellipse. A closed path has coinciding start and end points. Or they can exist independently as unclosed subpaths, such as lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: 一个画家路径是由一些图形构件组成的对象,如矩形、椭圆、线条和曲线。构件可以连接在封闭的子路径中,例如作为一个矩形或椭圆。一个封闭的路径有重合的起点和终点。或者它们可以作为非封闭的子路径独立存在,如线和曲线。

trans-unit.source: A painter path is an object composed of lines and curves. For example, a rectangle is composed by lines and an ellipse is composed by curves.
trans-unit.target: 画家路径是由线条和曲线组成的对象。例如,一个矩形是由线条组成的,一个椭圆是由曲线组成的。

trans-unit.source: A pair of glasses.
trans-unit.target: 一副眼镜。

trans-unit.source: A palette consists of three color groups:
trans-unit.target: 一个调色板由三组颜色组成。

trans-unit.source: A paragraph of text (usually found in documents).
trans-unit.target: 一段文字(通常出现在文件中);

trans-unit.source: A parameter can be unset by setting an invalid QVariant. Unsetting a parameter implies that the configuration is reset to its default setting.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置无效的QVariant来取消设置参数。取消设置参数意味着将配置重置为其默认设置。

trans-unit.source: A part of the document or web page that is complementary to the main content, usually a landmark (see WAI-ARIA).
trans-unit.target: 文件或网页中与主要内容相辅相成的部分,通常是一个里程碑(见WAI-ARIA)。

trans-unit.source: A partial match must be explicitly requested by specifying a match type of PartialPreferCompleteMatch or PartialPreferFirstMatch when calling QRegularExpression::match or QRegularExpression::globalMatch. If a partial match is found, then calling the hasMatch() function on the QRegularExpressionMatch object returned by match() will return false, but hasPartialMatch() will return true.
trans-unit.target: 在调用QRegularExpression :: match或QRegularExpression :: globalMatch时，必须通过指定PartialPreferCompleteMatch或PartialPreferFirstMatch的匹配类型来显式请求部分匹配。如果局部发现匹配，然后调用hasMatch（）的函数上QRegularExpressionMatch通过返回的对象匹配（）将返回 false ，但hasPartialMatch（）将返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: A particular look-and-feel might use smooth scrolling (eg. using SmoothedAnimation), might have a visible scrollbar, or a scrollbar that fades in to show location, etc.
trans-unit.target: 特定的外观可能会使用平滑滚动（例如，使用SmoothedAnimation），可能具有可见的滚动条或淡入显示位置的滚动条等。

trans-unit.source: A particular manager may support one or more visibility scopes. For example a manager from one provider may only provide places that are public to everyone, whilst another may provide both public and private places.
trans-unit.target: 一个特定的管理者可以支持一个或多个可视范围。例如,一个供应商的经理可能只提供对所有人公开的场所,而另一个供应商可能同时提供公共和私人场所。

trans-unit.source: A pie chart.

trans-unit.source: A pie legend marker is related to QPieSeries. With a pie series, each slice of the pie is related to one marker in the legend.
trans-unit.target: 饼图标记与QPieSeries有关。对于馅饼系列，馅饼的每个切片都与图例中的一个标记相关。

trans-unit.source: A pie series consists of slices that are defined as QPieSlice objects. The slices can have any values as the QPieSeries object calculates the percentage of a slice compared with the sum of all slices in the series to determine the actual size of the slice in the chart.
trans-unit.target: 饼图系列由定义为QPieSlice对象的切片组成。切片可以具有任何值，因为QPieSeries对象计算切片的百分比与系列中所有切片的总和之比，以确定图表中切片的实际大小。

trans-unit.source: A pie series consists of slices that are defined as QPieSlice objects. The slices can have any values as the QPieSeries object calculates the percentage of a slice compared with the sum of all slices in the series to determine the actual size of the slice in the chart.

A pie series consists of slices that are defined using the PieSlice type. The slices can have any values as the PieSeries type calculates the percentage of a slice compared with the sum of all slices in the series to determine the actual size of the slice in the chart.
trans-unit.target: 饼图系列由使用PieSlice类型定义的切片组成。切片可以具有任何值，因为PieSeries类型计算切片的百分比与系列中所有切片的总和之比，以确定图表中切片的实际大小。

trans-unit.source: A pie series consists of slices that are defined using the PieSlice type. The slices can have any values as the PieSeries type calculates the percentage of a slice compared with the sum of all slices in the series to determine the actual size of the slice in the chart.
A pie series.
trans-unit.target: 一派系列。

trans-unit.source: A pie slice has a value and a label. When the slice is added to a pie series, the PieSeries type calculates the percentage of the slice compared with the sum of all slices in the series to determine the actual size of the slice in the chart.
trans-unit.target: 饼图切片具有一个值和一个标签。当将切片添加到饼图系列时，PieSeries类型将计算该切片与该系列中所有切片的总和相比的百分比，以确定图表中切片的实际大小。

trans-unit.source: A pie slice has a value and a label. When the slice is added to a pie series, the QPieSeries object calculates the percentage of the slice compared with the sum of all slices in the series to determine the actual size of the slice in the chart.

trans-unit.source: A pinch gesture is a form of touch user input in which the user typically touches two points on the input device with a thumb and finger, before moving them closer together or further apart to change the scale factor, zoom, or level of detail of the user interface.

trans-unit.source: A pixmap can be used to represent the data while the drag is in progress, and will move with the cursor to the drop target. This pixmap typically shows an icon that represents the MIME type of the data being transferred, but any pixmap can be set with setPixmap(). The cursor's hot spot can be given a position relative to the top-left corner of the pixmap with the setHotSpot() function. The following code positions the pixmap so that the cursor's hot spot points to the center of its bottom edge:

trans-unit.source: A pixmap is automatically detached by Qt whenever its contents are about to change. This is done in almost all QPixmap member functions that modify the pixmap (fill(), fromImage(), load(), etc.), and in QPainter::begin() on a pixmap.
trans-unit.target: 每当Qt的内容即将更改时，它都会自动分离像素图。几乎所有修改像素图的QPixmap成员函数（fill（），fromImage（），load（）等）以及像素图上的QPainter :: begin（）都可以完成此操作。

trans-unit.source: A place attribute stores an additional piece of information about a Place that is not otherwise exposed through the Place type. A PlaceAttribute is a textual piece of data, accessible through the text property, and a label. Both the text and label properties are intended to be displayed to the user. PlaceAttributes are stored in an ExtendedAttributes map with a unique key.
trans-unit.target: 地点属性存储有关该地点的其他信息，否则该信息不会通过“ 地点”类型公开。一个PlaceAttribute是文字部分的数据，通过访问文本属性和标签。无论是文字和标签的属性旨在显示给用户。 PlaceAttributes 使用唯一键存储在ExtendedAttributes映射中。

trans-unit.source: A place attribute stores an additional piece of information about a Place that is not otherwise exposed through the Place type. A PlaceAttribute is a textual piece of data, accessible through the text property, and a label. Both the text and label properties are intended to be displayed to the user. PlaceAttributes are stored in an ExtendedAttributes map with a unique key.

A place generally cannot be saved directly between managers as is because it contains manager specific data such as icons and categories. In order to facilitate saving to one's own manager, engine implementers should implement the QPlaceManagerEngine::compatiblePlace() function. This function returns a copy of the input place with properties pruned or modified as necessary such that the copy can be saved into manager.
trans-unit.target: 通常，不能直接在管理者之间保存位置，因为该位置包含管理者特定的数据，例如图标和类别。为了便于保存到自己的管理器中，引擎实现者应实现QPlaceManagerEngine :: compatiblePlace（）函数。此函数返回输入位置的副本，该副本具有根据需要修剪或修改的属性，以便可以将副本保存到管理器中。

trans-unit.source: A place is a point of interest, it could be a favorite restaurant, a park or someone's home. A QPlace object represents a place by acting as a container for various information about that place.
trans-unit.target: 一个景点是一个景点，它可能是最喜欢的餐馆，公园或某人的家。甲QPlace对象表示通过作为关于该地点的各种信息的容器的地方。

trans-unit.source: A place is a point of interest, it could be a favorite restaurant, a park or someone's home. A QPlace object represents a place by acting as a container for various information about that place.
A place that has been returned from a search request may have more details that can be fetched. The following demonstrates how to check if there are further details and if so how to request them.
trans-unit.target: 从搜索请求中返回的地方可能有更多的细节可以获取。下面演示了如何检查是否有更多的细节,如果有,如何请求。

trans-unit.source: A places backend implementer needs to derive from QPlaceManagerEngine and provide implementations for the virtual functions relevant for their backend. Most of these functions are asynchronous and so implementers will also need to derive the appropriate reply classes. The reply objects are responsible for managing an asynchronous request; they are used to notify when a request is complete and hold the results of that request. QPlaceManagerEngine provides a default implementation for all virtual functions. The default implementations for the asynchronous functions return a reply that will emit the error() and finished() signals at the next iteration through the event loop.
trans-unit.target: 场所后端实现者需要从QPlaceManagerEngine派生并提供与其后端相关的虚拟功能的实现。这些函数大多数都是异步的，因此实现者还需要派生适当的答复类。回复对象负责管理异步请求；它们用于通知请求完成的时间并保留该请求的结果。QPlaceManagerEngine为所有虚拟功能提供默认实现。异步函数的默认实现返回一个应答，该应答将在通过事件循环的下一次迭代时发出error（）和finish（）信号。

trans-unit.source: A point is specified by a x coordinate and an y coordinate which can be accessed using the x() and y() functions. The isNull() function returns true if both x and y are set to 0. The coordinates can be set (or altered) using the setX() and setY() functions, or alternatively the rx() and ry() functions which return references to the coordinates (allowing direct manipulation).
trans-unit.target: 一个点由x坐标和y坐标指定，可以使用x（）和y（）函数进行访问。该参考isNull（）函数返回 true ，如果x和y是使用设置为0的坐标可设置（或改变）setX的（）和SETY（）函数，或可替代地，RX（）和RY（）函数，其返回引用坐标（允许直接操纵）。

trans-unit.source: A point is specified by a x coordinate and an y coordinate which can be accessed using the x() and y() functions. The coordinates of the point are specified using floating point numbers for accuracy. The isNull() function returns true if both x and y are set to 0.0. The coordinates can be set (or altered) using the setX() and setY() functions, or alternatively the rx() and ry() functions which return references to the coordinates (allowing direct manipulation).
trans-unit.target: 一个点由x坐标和y坐标指定，可以使用x（）和y（）函数进行访问。为了精确起见，使用浮点数指定了点的坐标。所述参考isNull（）函数返回 true ，如果x和y被设定为0.0。可以使用setX（）和setY（）函数，或者使用rx（）和ry（）函数来设置（或更改）坐标，这些函数可以返回对坐标的引用（允许直接操作）。

trans-unit.source: A point light is a light source that emits light in all directions, from a single point. Conceptually, this is similar to light given off by a standard light bulb.

A point light uses three attenuation factors to describe how the intensity of the light decreases over distance. These factors are designed to be used together in calcuating total attenuation. trans-unit.source: A popup widget is a special top-level widget that sets the Qt::WType_Popup widget flag, e.g. the QMenu widget. When the application opens a popup widget, all events are sent to the popup. Normal widgets and modal widgets cannot be accessed before the popup widget is closed.

trans-unit.source: A primary function of the sprite engine is its internal state machine. This is not the same as the states and transitions in Qt Quick, and is more like a conventional state machine. Sprites can have weighted transitions to other sprites, or back to themselves. When a sprite animation finishes, the sprite engine will choose the next sprite randomly, based on the weighted transitions available for the sprite that just finished.
trans-unit.target: 魍魉引擎的一个主要功能是其内部的状态机。这与Qt Quick中的状态和转换不同,更像是一个传统的状态机。魍魉可以有加权转场到其他魍魉,或者回到自己。当一个精灵动画完成时,精灵引擎会根据刚刚完成的精灵可用的加权转场随机选择下一个精灵。

trans-unit.source: A process's environment is composed of a set of key=value pairs known as environment variables. The QProcessEnvironment class wraps that concept and allows easy manipulation of those variables. It's meant to be used along with QProcess, to set the environment for child processes. It cannot be used to change the current process's environment.
trans-unit.target: 流程的环境由一组称为环境变量的键=值对组成。该QProcessEnvironment类包装这一概念，并允许这些变量的操控方便。它应与QProcess一起使用，以设置子进程的环境。它不能用于更改当前流程的环境。

trans-unit.source: A process's environment is composed of a set of key=value pairs known as environment variables. trans-unit.source: A property has a name() and a type(), as well as various attributes that specify its behavior: isReadable(), isWritable(), isDesignable(), isScriptable(), revision(), and isStored().
trans-unit.target: 属性具有名称（）和类型（），以及指定其行为的各种属性：isReadable（），isWritable（），isDesignable（），isScriptable（），revision（）和isStored（）。

trans-unit.source: A property is an attribute of an object that can be assigned a static value or bound to a dynamic expression. A property's value can be read by other objects. Generally it can also be modified by another object, unless a particular QML type has explicitly disallowed this for a specific property.
trans-unit.target: 属性是一个对象的属性,它可以被分配一个静态值或绑定到一个动态表达式。一个属性的值可以被其他对象读取,一般来说,它也可以被另一个对象修改,除非特定的QML类型明确不允许这样做。一般来说,它也可以被另一个对象修改,除非一个特定的QML类型明确地不允许一个特定的属性这样做。

trans-unit.source: A qualified name is the raw name of an attribute in the XML data. It consists of the namespace prefix(), followed by colon, followed by the attribute's local name(). Since the namespace prefix is not unique (the same prefix can point to different namespaces and different prefixes can point to the same namespace), you shouldn't use qualifiedName(), but the resolved namespaceUri() and the attribute's local name().
trans-unit.target: 限定名称是XML数据中属性的原始名称。它由名称空间前缀（），冒号和属性的本地名称（）组成。由于名称空间前缀不是唯一的（相同的前缀可以指向不同的名称空间，并且不同的前缀可以指向相同的名称空间），因此不应使用qualifiedName（），而应使用解析的namespaceUri（）和属性的本地名称（）。

trans-unit.source: A qualified name is the raw name of an element in the XML data. It consists of the namespace prefix, followed by colon, followed by the element's local name. Since the namespace prefix is not unique (the same prefix can point to different namespaces and different prefixes can point to the same namespace), you shouldn't use qualifiedName(), but the resolved namespaceUri() and the attribute's local name().

trans-unit.source: A read-write lock is a synchronization tool for protecting resources that can be accessed for reading and writing. This type of lock is useful if you want to allow multiple threads to have simultaneous read-only access, but as soon as one thread wants to write to the resource, all other threads must be blocked until the writing is complete.
trans-unit.target: 读写锁是一种同步工具,用于保护可以进行读写访问的资源。如果你想允许多个线程同时进行只读访问,但只要有一个线程想对资源进行写入,其他所有线程都必须被阻止,直到写入完成,那么这种类型的锁就很有用。

trans-unit.source: A reference sequence is read and written via QMetaObject::property() and thus is read and written as a QVariant. This means that changing the value of any element in the sequence from JavaScript will result in three steps occurring: the complete sequence will be read from the QObject (as a QVariant, but then cast to a sequence of the correct type); the element at the specified index will be changed in that sequence; and the complete sequence will be written back to the QObject (as a QVariant).
trans-unit.target: 通过QMetaObject :: property（）读取和写入参考序列，因此将其作为QVariant读取和写入。这意味着从JavaScript更改序列中任何元素的值将导致发生三个步骤：完整的序列将从QObject中读取（作为QVariant，然后转换为正确类型的序列）；指定索引处的元素将按该顺序更改；并将完整序列写回到QObject（作为QVariant）。

trans-unit.source: A remote object replica is a surrogate object that has (approximately) the same API as the SourceQObject it is replicating. There are a few additional properties and signals to make it possible to detect when the Replica is initialized or if it loses its connection to the Source object. There are a few other differences: a constant property on the source cannot be constant on the replica. The value will not be known at the time the replica is instantiated, it will only be known once the replica is initialized (see Remote Object Interaction).
trans-unit.target: 远程对象副本是一个替代对象，它具有与其复制的源QObject大约（相同）的API 。还有一些其他属性和信号，使您可以检测副本服务器何时初始化，或者它是否失去与Source对象的连接。还有其他一些区别：源上的常量属性在副本上不能常量。在实例化副本时，将不知道该值，只有在副本被初始化后才知道（请参阅Remote Object Interaction）。

trans-unit.source: A service becomes invalid if the QLowEnergyController disconnects from the remote device. An invalid service retains its internal state at the time of the disconnect event. This implies that once the service details are discovered they can even be retrieved from an invalid service. This permits scenarios where the device connection is established, the service details are retrieved and the device immediately disconnected to permit the next device to connect to the peripheral device.
trans-unit.target: 如果QLowEnergyController与远程设备断开连接，则服务无效。在断开事件发生时，无效的服务将保留其内部状态。这意味着一旦发现服务详细信息，甚至可以从无效服务中检索它们。这允许建立设备连接，检索服务详细信息并立即断开设备连接以允许下一个设备连接到外围设备的方案。

trans-unit.source: A service can become invalid when it looses the connection to the underlying device. Even though the connection may be lost it retains its last information. An invalid service cannot become valid anymore even if the connection to the device is re-established.
trans-unit.target: 当一个服务失去与底层设备的连接时,它可能会变得无效。即使连接可能丢失,它也会保留其最后的信息。即使重新建立了与设备的连接,无效的服务也不能再变得有效。

trans-unit.source: A session manager in a desktop environment (in which Qt GUI applications live) keeps track of a session, which is a group of running applications, each of which has a particular state. The state of an application contains (most notably) the documents the application has open and the position and size of its windows.
trans-unit.target: 桌面环境中的会话管理器(Qt GUI应用程序生活在其中)跟踪一个会话,它是一组正在运行的应用程序,每个应用程序都有一个特定的状态。一个应用程序的状态包含(最主要的)该应用程序打开的文档以及其窗口的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: A shortcut's context decides in which circumstances a shortcut is allowed to be triggered. The normal context is Qt::WindowShortcut, which allows the shortcut to trigger if the parent (the widget containing the shortcut) is a subwidget of the active top-level window.
trans-unit.target: 快捷方式的上下文决定了允许在哪种情况下触发快捷方式。普通上下文是Qt :: WindowShortcut，如果父级（包含快捷方式的小部件）是活动顶级窗口的子部件，则允许快捷方式触发。

trans-unit.source: A shortcut's key sequence can be set with setKey() and retrieved with key(). A shortcut can be enabled or disabled with setEnabled(), and can have "What's This?" help text set with setWhatsThis().

trans-unit.source: A side effect of associating each instance of QXmlName with a name pool is that each instance of QXmlName is tied to the QXmlNamePool with which it was created. However, the QXmlName class does not keep track of the name pool, so all the accessor functions, e.g., namespaceUri(), prefix(), localName(), and toClarkName() require that the correct name pool be passed to them. Failure to provide the correct name pool to these accessor functions results in undefined behavior.
trans-unit.target: 将QXmlName的每个实例与名称池相关联的副作用是，QXmlName的每个实例都与创建它的QXmlNamePool绑定在一起。但是，QXmlName类无法跟踪名称池，因此所有访问器函数（例如namespaceUri（），prefix（），localName（）和toClarkName（））都要求将正确的名称池传递给它们。无法为这些访问器函数提供正确的名称池会导致未定义的行为。

trans-unit.source: A side effect of associating each instance of QXmlName with a name pool is that each instance of QXmlName is tied to the QXmlNamePool with which it was created. However, the QXmlName class does not keep track of the name pool, so all the accessor functions, e.g., namespaceUri(), prefix(), localName(), and toClarkName() require that the correct name pool be passed to them. Failure to provide the correct name pool to these accessor functions results in undefined behavior.

trans-unit.source: A single QMimeData object can store the same data using several different formats at the same time. The formats() function returns a list of the available formats in order of preference. The data() function returns the raw data associated with a MIME type, and setData() allows you to set the data for a MIME type.

trans-unit.source: A single QMimeData object can store the same data using several different formats at the same time. The data() function returns the raw data associated with a MIME type, and setData() allows you to set the data for a MIME type.

A single filter represents one transformation or processing step on a video frame. The output is a modified video frame, some arbitrary data or both. For example, image transformations will result in a different image, whereas an algorithm for detecting objects on an image will likely provide a list of rectangles.

trans-unit.source: A singleton type enables properties, signals and methods to be exposed in a namespace without requiring the client to manually instantiate an object instance. QObject singleton types in particular are an efficient and convenient way to provide functionality or global property values.
trans-unit.target: 单例类型使属性，信号和方法可以在命名空间中公开，而无需客户端手动实例化对象实例。特别是QObject单例类型是一种提供功能或全局属性值的高效便捷的方法。

trans-unit.source: A singleton type may be either a QObject or a QJSValue. This function should be used to register a singleton type provider function which returns a QJSValue as a singleton type.
trans-unit.target: 单例类型可以是QObject或QJSValue。该函数应用于注册单例类型提供程序函数，该函数将QJSValue返回为单例类型。

trans-unit.source: A singleton type may be either a QObject or a QJSValue. This function should be used to register a singleton type provider function which returns a QObject of the given type T as a singleton type.
trans-unit.target: 单例类型可以是QObject或QJSValue。此函数应用于注册单例类型提供程序函数，该函数返回给定类型T 的QObject作为单例类型。

trans-unit.source: A singleton type may be referenced via the type name with which it was registered, and this typename may be used as the target in a Connections type or otherwise used as any other type id would. One exception to this is that a singleton type property may not be aliased (because the singleton type name does not identify an object within the same component as any other item).
trans-unit.target: 可以通过注册时使用的类型名称来引用单例类型，并且该类型名称可以用作Connections类型中的目标，或者用作其他任何类型ID。对此的一个例外是，可能不会为单例类型属性添加别名（因为单例类型名称不能标识与任何其他项目相同的组件内的对象）。

trans-unit.source: A site instance is a collection of web pages belonging to the same site. When the application explicitly loads a URL into Qt WebEngine (via QWebEnginePage::setUrl, for example), a new site instance is created for the page. However, when the user clicks same-site links on the page, the existing site instance is merely extended with more pages.
trans-unit.target: 网站实例是属于同一网站的网页的集合。当应用程序将URL明确地加载到Qt WebEngine中时（例如，通过QWebEnginePage :: setUrl），将为该页面创建一个新的站点实例。但是，当用户单击页面上的相同站点链接时，现有站点实例仅扩展了更多页面。

trans-unit.source: A size is specified by a width() and a height(). It can be set in the constructor and changed using the setWidth(), setHeight(), or scale() functions, or using arithmetic operators. A size can also be manipulated directly by retrieving references to the width and height using the rwidth() and rheight() functions. Finally, the width and height can be swapped using the transpose() function.
trans-unit.target: 大小由宽度（）和高度（）指定。可以在构造函数中设置它，并使用setWidth（），setHeight（）或scale（）函数或使用算术运算符对其进行更改。大小也可以通过使用rwidth（）和rheight（）函数检索对width和height的引用来直接操作。最后，可以使用transpose（）函数交换宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: A size is specified by a width() and a height(). Finally, the width and height can be swapped using the transpose() function.

trans-unit.source: A special kind of message called a "signal message" (a concept based on Qt's Signals and Slots mechanism), however, does not have a pre-defined destination. Since its purpose is to be used in a one-to-many context, signal messages are designed to work over an "opt-in" mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 但是，一种特殊的消息称为“信号消息”（基于Qt的“ 信号和插槽”机制的概念）没有预先定义的目的地。由于其目的是在一对多上下文中使用，因此信号消息被设计为在“选择加入”机制下工作。

Also, for the system locale this format is the same as ShortFormat.

A splash screen is a widget that is usually displayed when an application is being started. Splash screens are often used for applications that have long start up times (e.g. database or networking applications that take time to establish connections) to provide the user with feedback that the application is loading.

trans-unit.source: A stack is a last in, first out (LIFO) structure. Items are added to the top of the stack using push() and retrieved from the top using pop(). The top() function provides access to the topmost item without removing it.
trans-unit.target: 堆栈是后进先出（LIFO）结构。使用push（）将项目添加到堆栈的顶部，并使用pop（）从顶部检索项目。在顶部（）函数可以访问到的最上方项目而不删除。

trans-unit.source: A stack may have a clean state set with QUndoStack::setClean(). This is usually the state of the document at the point it was saved. QUndoView can display an icon in the list of commands to show the clean state. If this property is a null icon, no icon is shown. The default value is the null icon.
trans-unit.target: 堆栈可能使用QUndoStack :: setClean（）设置了干净状态。这通常是文档保存时的状态。QUndoView可以在命令列表中显示一个图标，以显示干净状态。如果此属性是空图标，则不会显示任何图标。默认值为空图标。

trans-unit.source: A stack may not have a clean index. This happens if a document is saved, some commands are undone, then a new command is pushed. Since push() deletes all the undone commands before pushing the new command, the stack can't return to the clean state again. In this case, this function returns -1. The -1 may also be returned after an explicit call to resetClean().
trans-unit.target: 堆栈可能没有干净的索引。如果保存了文档，撤消了某些命令，然后推送了新命令，则会发生这种情况。由于push（）在推送新命令之前会删除所有撤消的命令，因此堆栈无法再次返回到clean状态。在这种情况下，此函数返回-1。在显式调用resetClean（）之后，也可能返回-1 。

trans-unit.source: A state machine manages a set of states (classes that inherit from QAbstractState) and transitions (descendants of QAbstractTransition) between those states; these states and transitions define a state graph. Once a state graph has been built, the state machine can execute it. QStateMachine's execution algorithm is based on the State Chart XML (SCXML) algorithm. The framework's overview gives several state graphs and the code to build them.
trans-unit.target: 状态机管理一组状态（继承自QAbstractState的类）以及这些状态之间的转换（QAbstractTransition的后代）。这些状态和转换定义状态图。一旦建立了状态图，状态机就可以执行它。QStateMachine的执行算法基于状态图XML（SCXML）算法。该框架的概述给出了几个状态图以及用于构建它们的代码。

trans-unit.source: A stream reader reports an XML document as a stream of tokens. This differs from SAX as SAX applications provide handlers to receive XML events from the parser whereas the QXmlStreamReader drives the loop, pulling tokens from the reader when they are needed. This pulling approach makes it possible to build recursive descent parsers, allowing XML parsing code to be split into different methods or classes.

A style element is a graphical part of a GUI. A widget consists of a hierarchy (or tree) of style elements. For instance, when a style receives a request to draw a push button (from QPushButton, for example), it draws a label (text and icon), a button bevel, and a focus frame. The button bevel, in turn, consists of a frame around the bevel and two other elements, which we will look at later. Below is a conceptual illustration of the push button element tree. We will see the actual tree for QPushButton when we go through the individual widgets.
trans-unit.target: 样式元素是GUI的图形部分。小部件由样式元素的层次结构（或树）组成。例如，当样式收到绘制按钮的请求时（例如，来自QPushButton），它将绘制标签（文本和图标），按钮斜角和焦点框。反之，按钮斜角由围绕斜角的框架和其他两个元素组成，我们将在后面进行介绍。以下是按钮元素树的概念图。当我们浏览各个小部件时，我们将看到QPushButton的实际树。

trans-unit.source: A style usually has a set of standard images (such as a warning, a question, and an error image) for message boxes, file dialogs, etc. QStyle provides the StandardPixmap enum. Its values represent the standard images. Qt's widgets use these, so when you implement a custom style you should supply the images used by the style that is being implemented.
trans-unit.target: 样式通常具有一组用于消息框，文件对话框等的标准图像（例如，警告，问题和错误图像）。QStyle提供StandardPixmap枚举。其值代表标准图像。Qt的窗口小部件使用这些，因此，当您实现自定义样式时，应提供所实现的样式所使用的图像。

trans-unit.source: A surface data item holds the data for a single vertex in a surface graph. Surface data proxies parse data into QSurfaceDataItem instances for visualization.

A surface data proxy handles surface related data in rows. For this it provides two auxiliary typedefs: QtDataVisualization::QSurfaceDataArray and QtDataVisualization::QSurfaceDataRow. QSurfaceDataArray is a QList that controls the rows. QSurfaceDataRow is a QVector that contains QSurfaceDataItem objects. For more information about how to feed the data to the proxy, see the sample code in the Q3DSurface documentation.
trans-unit.target: 表面数据代理处理行中与表面相关的数据。为此，它提供了两个辅助的typedef：QtDataVisualization :: QSurfaceDataArray和QtDataVisualization :: QSurfaceDataRow。 QSurfaceDataArray 是控制行的QList。 QSurfaceDataRow 是一个QVector，其中包含QSurfaceDataItem对象。有关如何将数据提供给代理的更多信息，请参见Q3DSurface文档中的示例代码。

trans-unit.source: A tab widget provides a tab bar (see QTabBar) and a "page area" that is used to display pages related to each tab. By default, the tab bar is shown above the page area, but different configurations are available (see TabPosition). Each tab is associated with a different widget (called a page). Only the current page is shown in the page area; all the other pages are hidden. The user can show a different page by clicking on its tab or by pressing its Alt+
trans-unit.target: 选项卡小部件提供了一个选项卡栏（请参见QTabBar）和一个“页面区域”，该页面区域用于显示与每个选项卡相关的页面。默认情况下，选项卡栏显示在页面区域上方，但是可以使用不同的配置（请参见TabPosition）。每个选项卡都与一个不同的小部件（称为页面）相关联。页面区域中仅显示当前页面。其他所有页面均被隐藏。用户可以通过单击其标签或按其Alt +来显示其他页面

A temporary directory will have some static part of the name and some part that is calculated to be unique. The default path will be determined from QCoreApplication::applicationName() (otherwise qt_temp) and will be placed into the temporary path as returned by QDir::tempPath(). If you specify your own path, a relative path will not be placed in the temporary directory by default, but be relative to the current working directory. In all cases, a random string will be appended to the path in order to make it unique.
trans-unit.target: 临时目录将包含名称的一些静态部分和一些经计算是唯一的部分。默认路径将从QCoreApplication :: applicationName（）（否则为 qt_temp ）确定，并将放置在QDir :: tempPath（）返回的临时路径中。如果指定自己的路径，则默认情况下，相对路径不会放置在临时目录中，而是相对于当前工作目录的。在所有情况下，都会将随机字符串附加到路径中以使其唯一。

trans-unit.source: A temporary error occurred (e.g., operation would block and socket is non-blocking).
trans-unit.target: 发生了一个临时错误(例如,操作会阻塞,而socket是非阻塞的)。

trans-unit.source: A temporary file will have some static part of the name and some part that is calculated to be unique. The default filename will be determined from QCoreApplication::applicationName() (otherwise qt_temp) and will be placed into the temporary path as returned by QDir::tempPath(). If you specify your own filename, a relative file path will not be placed in the temporary directory by default, but be relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 临时文件将在名称中包含一些静态部分，并且某些部分经计算是唯一的。默认文件名将从QCoreApplication :: applicationName（）（否则为 qt_temp ）确定，并将其放入QDir :: tempPath（）返回的临时路径中。如果指定自己的文件名，则默认情况下，相对文件路径不会放置在临时目录中，而是相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: A testcase project is an app project intended to be run as an automated test. Any app may be marked as a testcase by adding the value testcase to the CONFIG variable.

trans-unit.source: A text block encapsulates a block or paragraph of text in a QTextDocument. QTextBlock provides read-only access to the block/paragraph structure of QTextDocuments. It is mainly of use if you want to implement your own layouts for the visual representation of a QTextDocument, or if you want to iterate over a document and write out the contents in your own custom format.
trans-unit.target: 文本块将文本块或段落封装在QTextDocument中。QTextBlock提供对QTextDocuments的块/段落结构的只读访问。如果要为QTextDocument的视觉表示实现自己的布局，或者要遍历文档并以自己的自定义格式写出内容，则主要使用它。

trans-unit.source: A text block encapsulates a block or paragraph of text in a QTextDocument. QTextBlock provides read-only access to the block/paragraph structure of QTextDocuments. It is mainly of use if you want to implement your own layouts for the visual representation of a QTextDocument, or if you want to iterate over a document and write out the contents in your own custom format.

trans-unit.source: A text color that is very different from palette.windowText, and contrasts well with e.g. palette.dark. Typically used for text that needs to be drawn where palette.text, palette.windowText or palette.buttonText would give poor contrast, such as on highlighted buttons.

trans-unit.source: A text frame groups together one or more blocks of text, providing a layer of structure larger than the paragraph. The format of a frame specifies how it is rendered and positioned on the screen. It does not directly specify the behavior of the text formatting within, but provides constraints on the layout of its children.
trans-unit.target: 文本框将一个或多个文本块组合在一起,提供比段落更大的一层结构。框架的格式指定了它在屏幕上的渲染和定位方式。它并不直接指定其中的文本格式行为,而是对其子代的布局提供限制。

trans-unit.source: A tool button can offer additional choices in a popup menu. The popup menu can be set using setMenu(). Use setPopupMode() to configure the different modes available for tool buttons with a menu set. The default mode is DelayedPopupMode which is sometimes used with the "Back" button in a web browser. After pressing and holding the button down for a while, a menu pops up showing a list of possible pages to jump to. The timeout is style dependent, see QStyle::SH_ToolButton_PopupDelay.
trans-unit.target: 工具按钮可以在弹出菜单中提供其他选择。可以使用setMenu（）设置弹出菜单。使用setPopupMode（）配置带有菜单集的工具按钮可用的不同模式。默认模式是DelayedPopupMode，有时与Web浏览器中的“返回”按钮一起使用。按住按钮一段时间后，会弹出一个菜单，显示可能跳转到的页面列表。超时取决于样式，请参见QStyle :: SH_ToolButton_PopupDelay。

trans-unit.source: A tool button is a special button that provides quick-access to specific commands or options. As opposed to a normal command button, a tool button usually doesn't show a text label, but shows an icon instead.
trans-unit.target: 工具按钮是一个特殊的按钮,它提供了对特定命令或选项的快速访问。与普通的命令按钮不同,工具按钮通常不显示文本标签,而是显示一个图标。

trans-unit.source: A tool button's icon is set as QIcon. This makes it possible to specify different pixmaps for the disabled and active state. The disabled pixmap is used when the button's functionality is not available. The active pixmap is displayed when the button is auto-raised because the mouse pointer is hovering over it.
trans-unit.target: 工具按钮的图标设置为QIcon。这使得可以为禁用状态和活动状态指定不同的像素图。当按钮的功能不可用时，将使用禁用的像素图。当自动升起按钮时，由于鼠标指针悬停在其上，因此显示活动像素图。

trans-unit.source: A tool button's label.
trans-unit.target: 一个工具按钮的标签。

trans-unit.source: A tool button, like QToolButton.
trans-unit.target: 工具按钮，例如QToolButton。

trans-unit.source: A tool tip is a short piece of text that informs the user of a control's function. It is typically placed above or below the parent control. The tip text can be any rich text formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示是一小段文本，用于通知用户控件的功能。通常将其放置在父控件的上方或下方。提示文本可以是任何富文本格式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A tool tip which provides information about other objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供其他对象信息的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: A toolbar can be fixed in place in a particular area (e.g., at the top of the window), or it can be movable between toolbar areas; see setMovable(), isMovable(), allowedAreas() and isAreaAllowed().
trans-unit.target: 工具栏可以固定在特定区域中（例如，在窗口顶部），也可以在工具栏区域之间移动。请参见setMovable（），isMovable（），allowedAreas（）和isAreaAllowed（）。

trans-unit.source: A toolbar like QToolBar.

trans-unit.source: A touch event was received or the mouse button was pressed but the scroll area is currently not dragged.

trans-unit.source: A touchpoint is modeled as an elliptical area where the finger is pressed against the touchscreen. (In fact, it could also be modeled as a bitmap; but in that case we expect an elliptical bounding estimate to be fitted to the contact patch before the event is sent.) The harder the user presses, the larger the contact patch; so, these diameters provide an alternate way of detecting pressure, in case the device does not include a separate pressure sensor. The ellipse is centered on scenePosition (position in the PointerHandler's Item's local coordinates). The rotation property provides the rotation of the ellipse, if known. It is expected that if the rotation is zero, the verticalDiameter of the ellipse is the larger one (the major axis), because of the usual hand position, reaching upward or outward across the surface.
trans-unit.target: 触摸点被建模为椭圆形区域，在该区域中手指被压在触摸屏上。（实际上，也可以将其建模为位图；但是在这种情况下，我们希望在事件发送之前将椭圆边界估计值拟合到接触补丁。）用户按下的力度越大，接触补丁就越大；因此，在设备不包括单独的压力传感器的情况下，这些直径提供了另一种检测压力的方式。椭圆的中心在scenePosition（位置在PointerHandler的项目的本地坐标）。的旋转属性提供椭圆的旋转，如果已知的话。预计如果轮换为零时，由于通常的手部位置，椭圆的verticalDiameter较大（主轴），其整个表面向上或向外延伸。

trans-unit.source: A touchpoint is modeled as an elliptical area where the finger is pressed against the touchscreen. (In fact, it could also be modeled as a bitmap; but in that case we expect an elliptical bounding estimate to be fitted to the contact patch before the event is sent.) The harder the user presses, the larger the contact patch; so, these diameters provide an alternate way of detecting pressure, in case the device does not include a separate pressure sensor. The ellipse is centered on scenePosition (position in the PointerHandler's Item's local coordinates). The rotation property provides the rotation of the ellipse, if known. It is expected that if the rotation is zero, the height is the larger dimension (the major axis), because of the usual hand position, reaching upward or outward across the surface.
trans-unit.target: 触摸点被建模为椭圆形区域，在该区域中手指被压在触摸屏上。 （实际上，也可以将其建模为位图；但是在这种情况下，我们希望在事件发送之前将椭圆边界估计值拟合到接触补丁。）用户按下的力度越大，接触补丁就越大；因此，在设备不包括单独的压力传感器的情况下，这些直径提供了另一种检测压力的方式。椭圆的中心在scenePosition（位置在PointerHandler的项目的本地坐标）。的旋转属性提供椭圆的旋转，如果已知的话。预期如果旋转为零，则高度是较大的尺寸（长轴），因为通常是手的位置，所以整个表面向上或向外延伸。

trans-unit.source: A transition is performed whenever a item is pushed or popped, and consists of two items: enterItem and exitItem. The StackView itself will never move items around, but instead delegates the job to an external animation set provided by the style or the application developer. How items should visually enter and leave the stack (and the geometry they should end up with) is therefore completely controlled from the outside.
trans-unit.target: 每当按下或弹出一个项目时，就会执行一次过渡，该过渡包括两个项目：enterItem和exitItem。该StackView本身永远不会走动的物品，而是委托工作由风格或应用程序开发者提供的外部动画集。因此，可以从外部完全控制物品在视觉上应如何进入和离开堆叠（以及最终应达到的几何形状）。

trans-unit.source: A transition is performed whenever a item is pushed or popped, and consists of two items: enterItem and exitItem. The StackView itself will never move items around, but instead delegates the job to an external animation set provided by the style or the application developer. How items should visually enter and leave the stack (and the geometry they should end up with) is therefore completely controlled from the outside.

trans-unit.source: A type is a subclass of another type if any instance of the first type is also an instance of the second. For example, all image/svg+xml files are also text/xml, text/plain and application/octet-stream files. Subclassing is about the format, rather than the category of the data (for example, there is no 'generic spreadsheet' class that all spreadsheets inherit from). Conversely, the parent mimetype of image/svg+xml is text/xml.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个类型的任何实例也是第二个类型的实例,那么一个类型就是另一个类型的子类。例如,所有图像/svg+xml文件也是text/xml、text/plain和application/octet-stream文件。子类是关于数据的格式,而不是数据的类别(例如,没有一个 "通用电子表格 "类,所有的电子表格都继承于此)。相反,image/svg+xml的父类mimetype是text/xml。

trans-unit.source: A type that is exposed as a grouped property differs from an object-type property in that the grouped property is read-only, and is initialized to a valid value by the parent object at construction. The grouped property's sub-properties may be modified from QML but the grouped property object itself will never change, whereas an object-type property may be assigned a new object value from QML at any time. Thus, the lifetime of a grouped property object is controlled strictly by the C++ parent implementation, whereas an object-type property can be freely created and destroyed through QML code.
trans-unit.target: 公开为分组属性的类型与对象类型属性的不同之处在于，分组属性是只读的，并且在构造时由父对象初始化为有效值。可以从QML修改分组属性的子属性，但是分组属性对象本身永远不会更改，而可以随时从QML为对象类型属性分配新的对象值。因此，分组属性对象的生存期由C ++父实现严格控制，而对象类型属性可以通过QML代码自由创建和销毁。

trans-unit.source: A type that is exposed as a grouped property differs from an object-type property in that the grouped property is read-only, and is initialized to a valid value by the parent object at construction. The grouped property's sub-properties may be modified from QML but the grouped property object itself will never change, whereas an object-type property may be assigned a new object value from QML at any time. Thus, the lifetime of a grouped property object is controlled strictly by the C++ parent implementation, whereas an object-type property can be freely created and destroyed through QML code.

trans-unit.source: A value axis can be set up to show an axis line with tick marks, grid lines, and shades. The values on the axis are drawn at the positions of tick marks.
trans-unit.target: 可以设置数值轴,以显示带有刻度线、网格线和阴影的轴线。轴线上的数值是在刻度线的位置上绘制的。

trans-unit.source: A value can have any of the above types. A boolean value is represented by the strings true or false in JSON. JSON doesn't explicitly specify the valid range for numbers, but the support in Qt is limited to the validity range and precision of doubles. A string can be any valid unicode string. An array is a list of values, and an object is a collection of key/value pairs. All keys in an object are strings, and an object cannot contain any duplicate keys.
trans-unit.target: 一个值可以有上述任何一种类型。布尔值在JSON中用字符串true或false表示。JSON没有明确规定数字的有效范围,但在Qt中的支持仅限于双数的有效范围和精度。一个字符串可以是任何有效的unicode字符串。数组是一个值的列表,对象是一个键/值对的集合。一个对象中的所有键都是字符串,一个对象不能包含任何重复的键。

trans-unit.source: A value can represent any of the above data types. In addition, QJsonValue has one special flag to represent undefined values. This can be queried with isUndefined().
trans-unit.target: 值可以代表上述任何数据类型。此外，QJsonValue具有一个特殊标志来表示未定义的值。可以使用isUndefined（）查询。

trans-unit.source: A value can represent any of the above data types. In addition, QJsonValue has one special flag to represent undefined values. This can be queried with isUndefined().
A value did not match the expected set or range.
trans-unit.target: 一个值不符合预期的集合或范围。

trans-unit.source: A value in JSON can be one of 6 basic types:

trans-unit.source: A value in the range [0-1] indicating the current progress.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating the nature of repetition.

trans-unit.target: 可以给

trans-unit.source: A value of -1 indicates no predefined x position. It will then be set automatically the next time the cursor moves up or down.
trans-unit.target: 值为-1表示没有预定义的X位置。当光标向上或向下移动时,它将会被自动设置。

trans-unit.source: A value of -1 indicates the encoder should make an optimal choice based on what is avaialbe from the audio source and the limitations of the codec.
trans-unit.target: 值为-1时,表示编码器应根据音频源的内容和编解码器的限制做出最佳选择。

trans-unit.source: A value of -1 indicates the encoder should make an optimal choice based on what is available from the audio source and the limitations of the codec.
trans-unit.target: 值为-1时,表示编码器应根据音频源的可用性和编解码器的局限性做出最佳选择。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 (the default) means that the number of connection channels would be set by the remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 值为0(默认)意味着连接通道的数量将由远程端点设置。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates that the interface index is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 值为0表示接口索引未知。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates that the value of the slider operates in a continuous range between minimumValue and maximumValue.
trans-unit.target: 值为0表示滑块的值在minimumValue和maximumValue之间的连续范围内操作。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates the encoder should make an optimal choice based on what is available from the video source and the limitations of the codec.
trans-unit.target: 值为0时,表示编码器应根据视频源的可用性和编解码器的局限性做出最优选择。

trans-unit.source: A value of 1 causes Qt to switch the window borders to black when

A value of 1.0 or above is treated as fully opaque, whereas a value of 0.0 or below is treated as fully transparent. Values inbetween represent varying levels of translucency between the two extremes.
trans-unit.target: 值为1.0或以上的为完全不透明,值为0.0或以下的为完全透明。介于两者之间的数值代表两个极端之间不同程度的透明性。

trans-unit.source: A value of 100 will keep the spacing unchanged; a value of 200 will enlarge the spacing after a character by the width of the character itself.
trans-unit.target: 值为100将保持间距不变;值为200将按字符本身的宽度扩大字符后的间距。

trans-unit.source: A value of 2 will in addition cause the Windows Vista style to be deactivated and switch to the Windows style using a simplified palette in dark mode. This is currently experimental pending the introduction of new style that properly adapts to dark mode.

A value of Qt::Horizontal or Qt::Vertical means that the widget can grow horizontally or vertically (i.e., the horizontal or vertical policy is Expanding or MinimumExpanding), whereas Qt::Horizontal | Qt::Vertical means that it can grow in both dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 的值Qt的::卧式或Qt的::立式装置，该窗口小部件可以水平或垂直生长（即，水平或垂直策略展开或MinimumExpanding），而Qt的::水平 | Qt :: Vertical表示它可以在两个维度上增长。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 (the default) will disable the heartbeat.
trans-unit.target: 值 0 （默认值）将禁用心跳。

trans-unit.source: A value of either 0 or Qt.Key_Unknown means that the event is not the result of a known key; for example, it may be the result of a compose sequence, a keyboard macro, or due to key event compression.
trans-unit.target: 值为0或Qt.Key_Unknown表示该事件不是已知密钥的结果。例如，它可能是合成序列，键盘宏的结果，或者是由于按键事件压缩引起的。

trans-unit.source: A value of either 0 or Qt::Key_unknown means that the event is not the result of a known key; for example, it may be the result of a compose sequence, a keyboard macro, or due to key event compression.
trans-unit.target: 值为0或Qt :: Key_unknown表示该事件不是已知密钥的结果。例如，它可能是合成序列，键盘宏的结果，或者是由于按键事件压缩引起的。

trans-unit.source: A value of less than zero means no point is being held within this handler's Item.
trans-unit.target: 小于零的值表示此处理程序的Item内没有任何点。

trans-unit.source: A value of the CheckType enum, which is either NotCheckable, Exclusive, or NonExclusive.
trans-unit.target: CheckType枚举的值，它是NotCheckable，Exclusive或NonExclusive。

trans-unit.source: A value of the Qt::Orientation enum that specifies whether the scroll bar is vertical or horizontal.
trans-unit.target: 所述的值Qt的::取向枚举指定是否滚动条是垂直的或水平的。

trans-unit.source: A value of the QTabBar::Shape enum indicating whether the tab has rounded or triangular corners and the orientation of the tab.
trans-unit.target: QTabBar :: Shape枚举的值，指示选项卡是圆角还是三角形以及选项卡的方向。

trans-unit.source: A value of the SelectedPosition enum that indicates whether the selected tab is adjacent to or is the tab.
trans-unit.target: 一个SelectedPosition枚举的值,表示所选选项卡是相邻的还是选项卡。

trans-unit.source: A value of the StepEnabled enum, indicating which of the spin box buttons are pressed down.
trans-unit.target: StepEnabled枚举的值,表示哪一个旋转盒按钮被按下。

trans-unit.source: A value that contains a simple set of property-value pairs (e.g. size refers to a value with width and height attributes)
trans-unit.target: 包含一组简单的属性-值对的值（例如，大小是指具有 width 和 height 属性的值）

trans-unit.source: A value that describes to which extent new drag velocities are included in the final scrolling velocity. This value should be in the range between 0 and 1. The lower the value, the more smoothing is applied to the dragging velocity.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，该值描述最终滚动速度在多大程度上包括新的拖动速度。该值应在 0 到 1 之间。值越小，拖动速度越平滑。

trans-unit.source: A variation of a command button is a menu button. These provide not just one command, but several, since when they are clicked they pop up a menu of options. Use the method setMenu() to associate a popup menu with a push button.

trans-unit.source: A video encoder settings object is used to specify the video encoder settings used by QMediaRecorder. Video encoder settings are selected by constructing a QVideoEncoderSettings object, setting the desired properties and then passing it to a QMediaRecorder instance using the QMediaRecorder::setEncodingSettings() function.
trans-unit.target: 视频编码器设置对象用于指定QMediaRecorder使用的视频编码器设置。通过构造QVideoEncoderSettings对象，设置所需的属性，然后使用QMediaRecorder :: setEncodingSettings（）函数将其传递到QMediaRecorder实例，可以选择视频编码器设置。

Video encoder settings are selected by constructing a QVideoEncoderSettings object, setting the desired properties and then passing it to a QMediaRecorder instance using the QMediaRecorder::setEncodingSettings() function.

trans-unit.source: A video frame can also have timestamp information associated with it. These timestamps can be used by an implementation of QAbstractVideoSurface to determine when to start and stop displaying the frame, but not all surfaces might respect this setting.
trans-unit.target: 视频帧还可以具有与之关联的时间戳信息。QAbstractVideoSurface的实现可以使用这些时间戳来确定何时开始和停止显示帧，但是并非所有表面都可以遵循此设置。

trans-unit.source: A video frame was not compatible with the format of the surface.

trans-unit.target: 一个视频监视器。

trans-unit.source: A video surface must be in the started state for present() to succeed, and the format of the video frame must be compatible with the current video surface format.
trans-unit.target: 视频表面必须处于启动状态才能成功,并且视频帧的格式必须与当前视频表面的格式兼容。

trans-unit.source: A video surface presents a continuous stream of identically formatted QVideoFrame instances, where the format of each frame is compatible with a stream format supplied when starting a presentation. Each frame may have timestamp information that can be used by the surface to decide when to display that frame.
trans-unit.target: 视频表面呈现格式相同的QVideoFrame实例的连续流，其中每个帧的格式与开始演示时提供的流格式兼容。每个帧都可以具有时间戳信息，曲面可以使用该时间戳信息来决定何时显示该帧。

trans-unit.source: A video surface presents a stream of video frames. The surface's format describes the type of the frames and determines how they should be presented.
trans-unit.target: 视频表面显示的是视频帧流。视频表面的格式描述了帧的类型,并决定了它们应该如何呈现。

trans-unit.source: A video.
trans-unit.target: 一段视频。

trans-unit.source: A view can be constructed without a model, but a model must be provided before it can display useful information. Views keep track of the items that the user has selected through the use of selections which can be maintained separately for each view, or shared between multiple views.
trans-unit.target: 可以在没有模型的情况下构造视图，但是必须提供模型才能显示有用的信息。视图通过使用选择来跟踪用户选择的项目，这些选择可以为每个视图单独维护，或者在多个视图之间共享。

trans-unit.source: A view can be constructed without a model, but a model must be provided before it can display useful information. Views keep track of the items that the user has selected through the use of selections which can be maintained separately for each view, or shared between multiple views.

A view is a visual container that displays the data and manages how visual items are shown such as in a list or a grid. The view may also be responsible for navigating the data, for example, scrolling through the visual items during a flicking motion.
trans-unit.target: 视图是一个可视化的容器,用于显示数据和管理可视化项目的显示方式,如列表或网格。视图还可能负责导航数据,例如,在轻移过程中滚动浏览可视项目。

trans-unit.source: A view mode where all the pages in the preview is viewed.
trans-unit.target: 查看预览中所有页面的视图模式。

trans-unit.source: A view transition may be interrupted at any time if a different view transition needs to be applied while the original transition is in progress. For example, say Item A is inserted at index 0 and undergoes an "add" transition; then, Item B is inserted at index 0 in quick succession before Item A's transition has finished. Since Item B is inserted before Item A, it will displace Item A, causing the view to interrupt Item A's "add" transition mid-way and start a "displaced" transition on Item A instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果在原过渡过程中需要应用不同的视图过渡,可以随时中断视图过渡。例如,假设项目A被插入到索引0处,并进行 "添加 "过渡;然后,项目B在项目A的过渡结束之前,被快速连续插入到索引0处。由于项目B插入在项目A之前,它将取代项目A,导致视图中途中断项目A的 "添加 "过渡,而在项目A上开始一个 "位移 "过渡。

trans-unit.source: A viewfinder settings object is used to specify the viewfinder settings used by QCamera. Viewfinder settings are selected by constructing a QCameraViewfinderSettings object, setting the desired properties and then passing it to a QCamera instance using the QCamera::setViewfinderSettings() function.
trans-unit.target: 取景器设置对象用于指定QCamera使用的取景器设置。通过构造QCameraViewfinderSettings对象，设置所需的属性，然后使用QCamera :: setViewfinderSettings（）函数将其传递到QCamera实例，来选择取景器设置。

A virtual folder will become the root directory of all files referenced in a compressed help file. When two documentation sets share the same virtual folder, they can use relative paths when defining hyperlinks pointing to each other. If a file is contained in both documentation sets, the one from the current set has precedence over the other.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟文件夹将成为压缩帮助文件中引用的所有文件的根目录。当两个文档集共享同一个虚拟文件夹时,它们可以在定义指向对方的超链接时使用相对路径。如果一个文件同时包含在两个文档集中,则当前文档集中的一个文件优先于另一个文件。

trans-unit.source: A volume rendered object is a box with a 3D texture. Three slice planes are supported for the volume, one along each main axis of the volume.
trans-unit.target: 体积渲染对象是一个具有3D纹理的盒子。体积支持三个切片平面,沿着体积的每条主轴都有一个。

trans-unit.source: A warning signal component may have two states, the NORMAL and the CRITICAL state. Suppose that in the NORMAL state, the color of the signal should be green and the warning flag is down. Meanwhile, in the CRITICAL state, the color should be red and the flag is up. We may model the states using the State type and the color and flag configurations with the PropertyChanges type.
trans-unit.target: 警告 signal 组件可以有两种状态，在 NORMAL 和 CRITICAL 状态。假设在 NORMAL 状态时， color 的信号应该是 green 和警示 flag 已关闭。同时，在“ CRITICAL 状态下， color 应为 red ，并且标记为 up 。我们可以使用 State 类型以及使用 PropertyChanges 类型的颜色和标志配置来对状态进行建模。
